member.name: M:WizardWrx.WebApplicationAids.ConfigFileReaders.GetConnectionStringFromWebConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the connection string identified by name by string from the official connectionStrings section of the web.config file specified by the relative or absolute file named in string .
member.param: This string must be either an absolute (fully qualified) file name or a name that is valid relative to the current working directory.
This string must contain the "name" property of a node in the connectionStrings section of a well-formed web.config file.

returns.para: If it succeeds, the return value is a ConnectionStringSettings object that has valid name and connectionString properties. Otherwise, the return value is NULL.
Its providerName property may have a value, or it may be null.
Regardless, the returned ConnectionStringSettings object can be treated as if it had been read from a web.config file in the usual way.

member.remarks: This method works by treating the web.config file as a standard XML document.

member.name: M:WizardWrx.WebApplicationAids.ConfigFileReaders.GetAppSettingsKeysFromAnyConfig(System.String,WizardWrx.WebApplicationAids.ConfigFileReaders.ConfigFileType,System.String[])
member.summary: Extract the application settings keys from a configuration file.
member.param: This string must be either an absolute (fully qualified) file name or a name that is valid relative to the current working directory.
This optional argument offers a hint in the form of a ConfigFileType enumeration member, to help identify the structure of the configuration file.
Pass in the list of names to include, or pass a null reference to cause all keys to be returned.
member.returns: This method returns a System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection that contains the keys specified by , or all keys if is null, contained in configuration file .

member.name: M:WizardWrx.WebApplicationAids.ConfigFileReaders.GetXmlNodeElementEnumerator(System.String)
member.summary: Get the System.Collections.IEnumerator for the configuration element (node) of the XML configuration document specified by string .
member.param: This string must be either an absolute (fully qualified) file name or a name that is valid relative to the current working directory. This parameter is a pass-through from the caller's argument list.
member.returns: The return value is the System.Collections.IEnumerator for a web or application configuration file.
